summary.body: The reason we were given for not being able to get Sky+ was that there is damaged asbestos in the risers in our block - doesn't that mean there are likely to be asbestos fibres circulating?  And looking at the panel behind our cistern there are a quite a few chips out of it - do the estate office remove these if they are damaged?
summary.subject: asbestos

summary.body: hi. i had a look on the inside of one of my planter boxes the other day and was a little alarmed to read the little sticker that said "TAKE CARE WITH AESBESTOS". uhm... anyone else know about this? are we really surrounded with an outside wall of carsenogenic concrete planters?
summary.subject: inhaling planters
